languages.text: "Я прикажу наказать каждого, кто оклеветал вас. В ваших действиях нет ничего предосудительного".

traits.locale_text: "Я прикажу наказать каждого, кто оклеветал вас. В ваших действиях нет ничего предосудительного".

languages.text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."
languages.original_text: "Я прикажу наказать каждого, кто оклеветал вас. В ваших действиях нет ничего предосудительного".

traits.locale_text: "Everyone who dares to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."
"Everyone who dares to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."
"Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."
"Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."
"Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

languages.text: “所有那些胆敢诽谤你的人，都将受到惩罚。你的行为并没有什么可指摘的地方。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: “所有那些胆敢诽谤你的人，都将受到惩罚。你的行为并没有什么可指摘的地方。”

languages.text: «Todos los que la han calumniado serán castigados. No ha hecho nada reprochable».
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los que la han calumniado serán castigados. No ha hecho nada reprochable».

languages.text: 「カシア殿を誹謗中傷した者は、みな罰せられる。そなたの行動に非難されるようなことは何もない」
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿を誹謗中傷した者は、みな罰せられる。そなたの行動に非難されるようなことは何もない」

languages.text: "Alle, die es gewagt haben, Euch zu verleumden, werden bestraft. Euer Handeln war in keiner Weise tadelnswert."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: "Alle, die es gewagt haben, Euch zu verleumden, werden bestraft. Euer Handeln war in keiner Weise tadelnswert."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez rien fait de répréhensible. Tous ceux qui vous ont calomniée seront punis. »
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez rien fait de répréhensible. Tous ceux qui vous ont calomniée seront punis. »

languages.text: "Seni karalama cüreti gösteren herkes cezalandırılacak. Suçlanmayı hak edecek herhangi bir şey yapmadın."
languages.original_text: "Everyone who has dared to slander you will be punished. There is nothing reprehensible about your actions."

traits.locale_text: "Seni karalama cüreti gösteren herkes cezalandırılacak. Suçlanmayı hak edecek herhangi bir şey yapmadın."
